article_title: IBM Watson To Buy Truven Health For $2.6 Billion, Bolsters Data Cloud

article_metadata.description: IBM said it will acquire Truven Health Analytics for $2.6 billion in cash, bringing to its Watson Health unit a major repository of health data from thousands of hospitals, employers and state governments. It’s the fourth major acquisition in the 10-month lifespan of IBM Watson Health, the computer giant’s artificial intelligence [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
